site.tarjeta-electoral-title: Register to vote, how to get a voter registration card
site.what-bring-registration-card: What do I need to bring to get my registration card to vote?
site.to-vote-req1: To vote in the General Elections in Puerto Rico you must be 18 years old (or older) on or before November 3, 2020.
site.rec-docs: We recommend that you bring one or more of the following documents:
site.rec-docs1: Driver's license or photo identification issued by the Government, Municipal or Federal Government.
site.rec-docs2: Original Birth Certificate. It may be necessary in the event that the CEE does not find your information in the Demographic Registry office.
site.req-docs1: Valid United States of America passport
site.optional-docs: Optional documents and situations you may encounter:
site.optional-docs1: Any utility bill with the address of the place where you live. This may be necessary in the event that the CEE cannot validate your address in their system.
site.born-in-other-countries: A foreign country and I reside in Puerto Rico
site.born-in-territory: United States, Continentals, Territories or Possessions
site.where-voter-card: Make an appointment and sign up to vote
site.where-voter-card-guide: Find the Enrollment Center closest to you and sign up.
site.voter-status: Check the status of your voter registry
site.voter-status-guide: Check which is your polling location along with its address and the status of your voter card.
site.voter-important-guide1: It is extremely important that you verify the status of your voter card so that you can cast your vote on Election Day. If your voter card is not active, you must visit the nearest Enrollment Center to activate it.
site.voter-important-guide2: If you have moved recently, it is important to renew your electoral card to exercise your vote in the municipality and corresponding Voting Center.
site.voter-status-note: This link will take you to the page of the "Comisión Estatal de  Elecciones". There you can fill out the form that will tell you the status of your voter registry.
site.register-to-vote-today: Register to vote today at an Enrollment Center near you. No Appointment required.

footer.contribute: How can I contribute to the project?
footer.contribute-note1: "Para Votar" is not affiliated with the Puerto Rico government or any political party.
footer.contribute-note2: "Para Votar" does not store any type of user information.
footer.contribute-note3: The code of this project is completly open and
footer.contribute-note4: you can see it on GitHub
footer.contribute-note5: The code of this project is open
footer.contribute-note6: Thanks to all the people who have given us their feedback to improve this tool.
footer.support1: For suggestions and comments you can contact us by
footer.support2: or you can open an issue on
